Item.name: Tool Belt with Lunch Box
Item.description: A Tool Belt with a Lunch Box attached to it to always carry your food with you.

Item.name: Lunch Box
Item.description: It's a box with a handle to carry your food around. Can be attached to a toolbelt at a fabricator.

Item.name: Cooler Crate
Item.description: Used to prevent meat from spoiling. Needs a battery.

Item.name: Jar Crate
Item.description: A crate to store and carry your jars. Bottles don't fit.

Item.name: Liquor Crate
Item.description: A crate to store and carry your bottles. Jars don't fit.

Item.name: Couwola Cola Crate
Item.description: A crate from Couwola Cola to store and carry your bottles. Jars don't fit.

Item.name: Liquor Crate Shelf
Item.description: A shelf to store up to 4 of your liquor and jar crates.

Item.name: Liquor Crate Shelf (Small)
Item.description: A small shelf to store up to 2 of your liquor and jar crates.

Item.name: Liquor Display Shelf
Item.description: A shelf to display and store your bottles. Jars don't fit.

Item.name: Kitchen Sink
Item.description: Can store up to 18 different small or medium items and refill empty bottles and kegs with sea water.

Item.name: Kitchen Counter
Item.description: Can store up to 30 different small items.

Item.name: Cafeteria Cart
Item.description: Can store up to 30 different small items.

Item.name: Refrigerator
Item.description: Prevents spoilage. Can only store food and drinks. Needs power.

Sub-Editor exclusive variant of the refrigerator without the built-in battery. Useful when wanting to make custom refrigerator designs using different items and parts in sub-editor as the original refrigerator would always display the battery status on top of the custom build. Prevents spoilage. Can only store food and drinks. Needs power.
